posts.post_title: Looking For a T332 Helmar Stamp fred toney
posts.post_content:
Hello eveyrone, I am still looking for a Fred Toney T332 Helmar Stamp.  A large set of individual stamps is currently on ebay but still no Fred Toney.  If anyone has one please message me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url] or through the net54 board.  Thanks

TT
